definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: He played the leading part of Othello in the tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 他在悲劇中扮演主角奧賽羅。

sentences.english: I thought he carried off the part of Othello with great skill.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲他將奧賽羅的角色詮釋得非常出色。

sentences.english: Iago distilled poison into Othello's mind.
sentences.chinese: 依阿高把毒藥滴在奧賽羅心中。
奧賽羅的頭髮一夜之間全變白了。

sentences.english: So, I named my program Nura Othello.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我命名爲我的程序努拉奧賽羅。

sentences.english: He was cast in the role of Othello.
sentences.chinese: 他被選派扮演奧賽羅的角色。
奧賽羅是位妒忌心很重的丈夫。

sentences.english: In "Othello, " lago convinces Othello that his wife has been unfaithful to him.
sentences.chinese: 在“奧賽羅”奧賽羅拉戈說服他的妻子對他不忠。

sentences.english: In "Othello, " lago convinces Othello that his wife has been unfaithful to him.
sentences.chinese: 在“奧賽羅”奧賽羅拉戈說服他的妻子對他不忠。

sentences.english: He had always wanted to play Othello.
It was made for a beginner to learn the rules of Nura Othello.
sentences.chinese: 這是爲初學者學習的努拉奧賽羅的規則。

sentences.english: You can see simple information about Nura Othello there.
sentences.chinese: 您可以看到有關努拉奧賽羅有簡單的信息。

sentences.english: Everyone rhapsodizes over Tom's performance as Othello.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都熱烈的談論着湯姆扮演奧賽羅。
他扮演奧賽羅精彩極了。
